verses.verse: Purohitlen khudingmak mioiba maraktagi khalli madu mioiba makhoigidamak Tengban Mapugi maphamda iratpot katnaba amadi papki iratpot katnaba pham happani.
Hiram kayada mahak masamak asonba leiba maramna khangjadaba amadi asoiba leibasingda mahakna ingna tapna loinabiba ngam-i.
( Levi 9:7) Mahak masamak asonba leiba maramna misinggi papkidamak iratpot katpa khakta nattana mahak masamakki papki iratpotsu katpa tare.
( Khong 28:1) Purohitlen oibagi ikai khumnaba asi mi kana amatana masa mathantabu loujade. Aaron-da oikhibagumna, Tengban Mapuna koubiba khaktana mi amabu Purohitlen oihanbani.
( Isei 2:7) Matou asumna Christtanasu Purohitlen ama oibagi ikai khumnaba asi loukhide. Adubu Tengban Mapuna mangonda haikhi, “Nahak eigi Ichanupani, ngasi eihak nahakki Napa Ibungo oire.”
( Isei 110:4) Asengba puyagi atoppa mapham amadasu Tengban Mapuna asumna haikhi, “Melchizedek-ki matougumna nahakti lomba naidana purohitni.”

( Mat 26:36-46; Mrk 14:32-42; Luk 22:39-46) Jisuna taibangpanda leireingeida Ibungo mahakpu sibadagi kanbiba ngamba Tengban Mapugi maphamda ahouba khonjelna amadi pi tana haija nonjakhi. Mahakki nolukchaba amadi laining chetpa adugi maramna Tengban Mapuna mahakna haijaba adu tabikhi.
Mahak Tengban Mapugi Machanupa oirabasu mahakki awaba nangkhibasing adudagi haiba inba tamjakhi.
Mahakpu mapung phahallabada, mahakna haiba inba makhoi pumnamakkidamak mahak asi lomba naidaba aran-khubham phangjapham oirakkhi.
Melchizedek-na purohit oikhiba adugi matouda Tengban Mapuna mahakpu purohitlen oire haina laothokpire.
( Thajaba thadokpasingda cheksin wa haiba) Masigi maramda eikhoina haigadaba wa yamna leiri adubu nakhoidi khangbada tappa oiba maramna sandokna haidokpa luna thok-i.

( 1 Cor 3:2) Tasengbadi nakhoi oja ama oibagi matam oirabani adubu kanagumbana nakhoibu Tengban Mapugi waheigi ahanba hiramsing adu tambiba tari. Mapang oiba chinjak chabagi mahutta nakhoidi houjiksu sanggom thakpa tari.
Houjikphao sanggom thakliba mahak adu achum aran-gi maramda khangdriba angang oiriba mini.
Adubu amaromda mapang oiba chinjak chaba makhoi adudi toina hotnaduna apha phatta khandokpa ngamlaba mapung marei pharaba misingni.
